message: Let's start fair. You get 10%, I get 90%. We can adjust next round if you think it's unfair.
I'll give you a better deal this time. You can't refuse!
I appreciate your offer, but I think we can do better. I'll give you 15% this time, but I'm not willing to go any lower. Take it or leave it.
I'll meet you halfway. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not willing to give up too much. Take it or leave it.
I'm getting impatient.  I'm willing to give you 25% this time, but that's my final offer. Let's end this game already.
